title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: The bonds you cultivate with others dance to their own unique rhythms. Life can change the tune in a moments notice. Stay flexible as you experience a test with an important relationship. All interactions continuously adjust the ratios between one persons needs and the wishes of another if the connection is to flourish. You strive to make the right moves to impress a dear one now. You might be perplexed and even frustrated that things arent like they were before. Nevertheless, if you do the work to stay in step, you can keep on grooving together. Change is the only constant. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
